Method Detail

save

public void save(java.util.List<T> objects)
          throws java.io.IOException
Serializes all Objects into an XML-file at the given location. - If some instance fields of an object are not to be saved, make sure to define them as transient

Parameters:
objects - The List of Objects to be stored.
location - The path under which the file is to be stored.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - In case some problems occur during saving.

load

public java.util.List<T> load()
                       throws java.io.IOException
Loads all former saved Objects from an XML-file at the given location.

Parameters:
location - The path where the file is stored.
Returns:
List of all loaded Objects.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
